summary: Defines the UnivNet neural vocoder model, handling the conversion of mel‑spectrogram inputs into raw audio waveforms, including data preparation, training loops, validation, checkpointing, and export for inference within the NeMo TTS framework.
business_intent: Enable high‑quality speech synthesis by providing a trainable and deployable vocoder component that turns mel‑spectrograms generated by text‑to‑speech systems into natural sounding audio.
